extras.title: Photopea - Photoshop Equivalent
extras.description: Photopea is a free online image editor, supporting PSD, Sketch and XCF files.

extras.title: Figma* - Illustrator Alike
extras.description: Figma is a vector graphics editor and prototyping tool.

extras.title: Vectr - Illustrator Alike
extras.description: Similar to Figma, however it is a more lightweight option, and it does not require an account.
